posting_body: For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>

Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!
This is for an apartment rental.
RCG does not rent by the room.
VIRTUAL TOUR:
https://kuula.co/post/7Flyh/collection/7lKQf
No in person showings available.
Available for 9/1/22.
Charming but spacious second-floor 2BR/2Bath apartment with hardwood throughout.
Comfy living room and dining nook, tons of natural light.
Kitchen features granite countertops and updated appliances.
Each bedroom has its own private bathroom with updated tile flooring and amenities.
Off-street parking may be available for $50/month.
Private access Coin-op laundry available in basement directly across the street from this property.
Tenant pays all utilities including sub-metered W/S. Conveniently located minutes from Moody St & Waltham Center!
Easy access to shops, restaurants, commuter rail to Boston, buses, Mass Pike, Route 128, and I-95.
No dogs.
